text: A Tomb of the Unknown Soldier is a memorial or grave dedicated to a soldier whose dead body has not been identified. == Related pages == * Missing in action == Other websites == * Copernicus Organization, World Veterans Federation, "Tombs of the Unknown Soldier in Central and Eastern Europe" by Prof. Micha≈Ç Chilczuk, Chairman, Working Group on Central and Eastern Europe, SCEA * Vivaboo.com, "Tomb Of The Unknown Soldier Around The World (History)" Category:Military people missing in action
title: Tomb of the Unknown Soldier
